level.heading: Frequency of games; sale of alcoholic beverages.
level.text: ยง 20-350 Frequency of games; sale of alcoholic beverages. No game or games of bingo shall be conducted under any license issued under this subchapter and article fourteen-H of the general municipal law more often than on eighteen days in any three successive calendar months; or in any room or outdoor area where alcoholic beverages are sold or served during the progress of the game or games.
